chapter.keywords: online king james holy bible, king james bible, bible todo list, words of Jesus, bible index, the authorised version, KJV, KJB, KJAV, AV

items.text: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.
items.plainText: Praise ye the LORD. Praise God in his sanctuary: praise him in the firmament of his power.

items.text: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.
items.plainText: Praise him for his mighty acts: praise him according to his excellent greatness.

items.text: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.
items.plainText: Praise him with the sound of the trumpet: praise him with the psaltery and harp.

items.text: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.
items.plainText: Praise him with the timbrel and dance: praise him with stringed instruments and organs.

items.text: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.
items.plainText: Praise him upon the loud cymbals: praise him upon the high sounding cymbals.

items.text: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.
items.plainText: Let every thing that hath breath praise the LORD. Praise ye the LORD.
